All school related activities are canceled for the rest of this school year except graduation. Plans for graduation will be announced later.

SCHOOL OFFICE HOURS All Latta schools will be closed to ALL STAFF and the PUBLIC until further notice.
DISTRICT OFFICE HOURS Until further notice, the district office will be open on a limited basis from 9am until noon on Tuesdays only.
OFFICIAL SCHOOL NEWS Please be advised that all official announcements regarding school matters are posted at school websites and are sent to you through our ALERT system. Any school matters posted through social media are not official or authorized by the school system and maybe incorrect.
SCHOOL HOME ASSIGNMENTS Please keep the first and second set of home assignments at home until we announce plans to receive them back at school. All of these home assignments will be reviewed and graded by teachers to enhance the final second semester grades.

4K Registration for 2020-2021
Parents that want to fill out the registration forms for 4 year old kindergarten may do so by downloading and printing the 18 page document, completing it and gathering the necessary documentation. The document is at this link:
4K Registration Form.
Once school offices are able to be opened, we will accept the application and the documentation needed to begin the registration process for your student. Children that turn 4 ON OR BEFORE September 1, 2020 are eligible to attend 4 year old kindergarten at Latta Elementary School during the 20-21 school year. If you do not have access to a printer, you will be able to pick up a copy in the school office, once it has reopened.
Parents will also need to provide the following documentation for each child:
Official Birth Certificate (blue card or green form)
Social Security Card
Current Immunization Record
Medicaid Card
Two proofs of residency that you reside within the Latta School District (current electric, water or land line phone bills, Driver's license, property tax notice).
